::Firearm::

Firearm lands and spins around, his scanners trying to get a lock on 
Wildrider through the ash. He fires two missiles from his turret.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: didnt know there was ash, But I do now
> 
> Wildrider looks around in the ash, not sure if he hit his target. 
He then
> hears a whisling sound and a missile hits him, the explosion sends 
him
> back, one of his horns falls off as his face is mutilated, "yah, I 
missed
> that kind of pain" he screams transforming to car mode and driving 
out of
> the way avoiding the other missile and the tank.
